wikipedia_page.main: Steven Sivyer (born 1974) is a composer and organist currently based in Martham, Norfolk. He is the Priest-in-Charge at The Benefice of Martham. He used to be director of music at St. Mary of Charity, Faversham Parish Church, and ran a successful church choir there. The choir received many awards from the RSCM, including the highest Gold Award with two successful candidates in 2007. The choir used to regularly tour various cathedrals across England. His most frequently performed compositions were church works including Have Mercy Upon Me O God (1997) and Ubi Caritas (2004).
